author: niclas
msg: To support Jaas, I need to include the Jetty-Jaas as a dependency.

author: leif
msg: Fix a problem where I was firing off a connected event before a new connection to the server had actually been verified.

author: leif
msg: Modify so that pool sizes are instrumented even if the instruments are not active.  This is necessary so that pool sizes will immediately be valid when a new instrument sample is registered.
Avoid some synchronization to make the above much more efficient.
